data.name: HuniePop Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The official digital soundtrack for HuniePop including all 23 musical compositions from the game! The soothing ear-candy within this album is a mixture of pop, jazz and bossa nova melodies with flirty and romantic themes.
data.about_the_game: The official digital soundtrack for HuniePop including all 23 musical compositions from the game! The soothing ear-candy within this album is a mixture of pop, jazz and bossa nova melodies with flirty and romantic themes.
data.short_description: The official digital soundtrack for HuniePop including all 23 musical compositions from the game! The soothing ear-candy within this album is a mixture of pop, jazz and bossa nova melodies with flirty and romantic themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content including frequent nudity, sexual dialog, sexual scenes/scenarios, references to drug/alcohol use, and anime boobies.
